rule: 4.5.2 Indent continuation lines at least +4 spaces

sub_rules.content: When line-wrapping, each line after the first (each continuation line) is indented at least +4 from the original line.
sub_rules.formalization: the quantity of continuation_line.indentation must be greater than or equal to original_line.indentation + 4

sub_rules.content: When there are multiple continuation lines, indentation may be varied beyond +4 as desired. In general, two continuation lines use the same indentation level if and only if they begin with syntactically parallel elements.
sub_rules.formalization: the quantity of begin_with_syntactically_parallel_elements_line1.indentation must be equal to begin_with_syntactically_parallel_elements_line2.indentation
